original_text: He has thrown me down into the mud. I am no better than dust and ashes on the ground. He has thrown me down into the mud. I am no better than dust and ashes on the ground. He has thrown me down into the mud.
korean_text: 하나님이 나를 진흙 가운데 던지셨고 나를 티끌과 재 같게 하셨구나

sentences.original_text: He has thrown me down into the mud
I am no better than dust and ashes
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 먼지와 재보다 나을 것이 없다
